review: I am very pleased,  works well!
author: Rosa A De Chavez

review: I'm enjoying the many viewing options I now have, as well as the great, huge selection of music. I love the fact that I can select an album and play away! The stick came with easy to follow directions. It was a piece of cake to install. Love it!
author: Diana P.

review: I LOVE MY FIRE TV STICK--DITCHED THE 100 A MONTH CABLE BILL AND WATCH TV A SMARTER WAY.  I HAVE ALREADY WATCHED ABOUT 10 MOVIES/SHOWS I HAVE NEVER HEARD OF THAT HAVE CONTENT AND A REAL STORY, INTERESTING AND THOUGHT PROVOKING.  I AM SO GLAD I PURCHASED THIS-IT WAS AFFORDABLE AND IT WORKS VERY WELL--THANK YOU AMAZON!!!
author: Laurie

review: Works great.  And its easy to move from place to place.
author: Jacob Bruner "fluteplr"

review: Bought the Fire TV Stick for my daughter. She did the set up by herself.
author: Kj "Kj"

review: So far it is working great!
author: CJ
